text:
I ordered a large pizza with spinach and the spinach went bad a long time ago. The spinach is not removable since it turns to a slimy substance when you try to pick it off. It tastes rancid and leaves a residue.
Breadsticks were good though.

text: The service is great half the time, but pour the other half. That doesn't make up for the mediocre pizza, nasty bathrooms, and the doors that creak, squeal, and crack when opened. Would not recommend, go down the road for cheaper, better tasting, and faster pizza.
